rules_text:
Shipwright 1 [i](When this enters, put a +1/+1 counter on it or a Vehicle you control.)[/i]
If damage would be dealt to a creature you control during your turn, you may remove a +1/+1 counter from that creature to prevent that damage.
notes:
GW:
 - Odd MVs
 - +1/+1 counters
RG:
 - two of each land type
 - wayfarer 5c
GU:
 - five or more alternate costs
 - fathom
BG:
 - mana value 3 or greater
 - graveyard (lands)
